General.Name: Compucase Enterprise Co Ltd
General.Description: Compucase Enterprise Co., Ltd. designs and manufactures PC cases, power supplies, rackmount chassis, and cabinets worldwide. It also manufactures LED Drivers, LED Luminaire, LED panel, and switching power and open frame power supplies. The company manufactures and sells medical devices and equipment; computers, server chassis, keyboards, scanners, dies and other components; and electronics, optoelectronic products, precision dies and precision plastic injectors. It offers its products under the HEC brand to OEM customers, industrial users, system integrators, and retail customers. Compucase Enterprise Co., Ltd. was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Tainan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 225, An Ho Road, Tainan City, Taiwan
